channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- RobotWare
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- RobotWare

item.title: CVE-2021-22279|2024-09-16T17:38:50.816Z -- abb -- robotware
item.description: A Missing Authentication vulnerability in RobotWare for the OmniCore robot controller allows an attacker to read and modify files on the robot controller if the attacker has access to the Connected Services Gateway Ethernet port.
